Sentencas: Solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) have received widespread attention due to their high efficiency, greenness and flexibility.
Titulo: The development of solid oxide electrolysis cells: Critical materials, technologies and prospects

Sentencas: SOECs produce value-added chemicals by electrocatalytically reducing CO 2 , which is of great significance for achieving CO 2 reduction and renewable energy storage.
Titulo: The development of solid oxide electrolysis cells: Critical materials, technologies and prospects

Sentencas: This review first comprehensively explains the mechanism of SOEC electrolysis of CO 2 , followed by a detailed introduction to the classification and synthesis strategies of electrolyte, cathode and anode materials, including the microstructure design of electrodes.
Titulo: The development of solid oxide electrolysis cells: Critical materials, technologies and prospects

Sentencas: The reasons for SOEC performance degradation and countermeasures are discussed next.
Titulo: The development of solid oxide electrolysis cells: Critical materials, technologies and prospects

Sentencas: The related economic benefits of SOEC are also introduced.
Titulo: The development of solid oxide electrolysis cells: Critical materials, technologies and prospects

Sentencas: Finally, the challenges and prospects that SOEC needs to face for further technological utilization and commercialization are summarized.
Titulo: The development of solid oxide electrolysis cells: Critical materials, technologies and prospects
